propositions.text: The story begins with a mysterious invitation from Du Xiaomei.
Mo Lan receives a call from Dai Rou about the invitation.
Du Xiaomei was a college acquaintance of Mo Lan and Dai Rou, younger and from a wealthy background.
The invitation is for a gathering at Du Xiaomei's villa for 'Eight Delicacies Soup'.
Mo Lan recalls the story of 'Eight Delicacies Soup', a tragic murder case from 10 years prior.
The case involved Zhang Suping, Mo Lan's college dorm mate.
Zhang Suping had a complex and troubled upbringing with adoptive parents.
Her adoptive mother, Tu Zhen, exhibited disturbing behavior and forced Zhang Suping to dress as a boy.
Zhang Suping fell in love with her employer, Lu Qiang, a widower.
Lu Qiang broke up with Zhang Suping for another woman.
In revenge, Zhang Suping murdered Lu Qiang's new girlfriend and served parts of her body in 'Eight Delicacies Soup'.
Zhang Suping then committed suicide by jumping from an 11th-floor window.
The friends gather at Du Xiaomei's luxurious European-style villa.
Mo Lan arrives and is greeted by Du Xiaomei and Dai Rou.
Jiang Rongxi arrives, and they are all pulled into the house.
Mo Lan reflects on her strong bond with Jiang Rongxi, her financial advisor and friend.
Mo Lan notes that Jiang Rongxi is more accomplished than Du Xiaomei, who is a wealthy but idle housewife.
Zhao Yanshu, the most beautiful but also the most timid of the group, also arrives.
Du Xiaomei announces it's time to eat, mentioning her 'Eight Delicacies Soup'.
Dai Rou is seen on the phone, looking grim and full of malice.
During dinner, the conversation turns to the 'Eight Delicacies Soup' case.
The friends express their shock and disbelief at Zhang Suping's actions.
Dai Rou defends Zhang Suping's actions as justified against a "heartless man."
Jiang Rongxi suggests Zhang Suping was also a victim and should have targeted the man.
Du Xiaomei makes a disturbing remark about potentially doing the same to a rival.
Du Xiaomei reveals her 'Eight Delicacies Soup' is actually a mushroom and chicken soup.
Du Xiaomei announces she is pregnant.
The friends congratulate her, but Dai Rou seems skeptical.
Du Xiaomei elaborates on her pregnancy plans and her husband Liao Yongli's reactions.
Zhao Yanshu suddenly feels ill and runs to the bathroom, experiencing nausea.
Dai Rou accuses Du Xiaomei of poisoning Zhao Yanshu.
Jiang Rongxi dismisses it as Zhao Yanshu's usual stomach problems.
Mo Lan checks on Zhao Yanshu, who claims to be feeling better but is still visibly distressed.
Du Xiaomei shows a look of distinct disgust towards Zhao Yanshu.
Du Xiaomei dramatically claims to see a hair in Zhao Yanshu's soup, causing panic.
Jiang Rongxi calmly removes the hair, revealing it was a prank.
Du Xiaomei laughs maniacally, revealing her cruel nature.
The dinner concludes, and the friends decide to stay overnight due to the villa's remote location.
Mo Lan and Jiang Rongxi share a room, while Du Xiaomei assigns Zhao Yanshu to a room alone.
The friends help clean up, with only Dai Rou absent until she emerges from the toilet.
Du Xiaomei suggests they do face masks to pass the time.
Jiang Rongxi is hesitant due to her sensitive skin.
Du Xiaomei assures them she has masks for all skin types.
Mo Lan encourages Jiang Rongxi to try it, and Du Xiaomei mentions she is pregnant, which seems to sway Jiang Rongxi.
During the face mask session, a tense conversation ensues about Du Xiaomei's attempts to contact Dai Rou.
Dai Rou expresses her frustration at not being able to find Du Xiaomei.
Mo Lan questions why Dai Rou is avoiding Du Xiaomei.
The conversation shifts to their past, specifically their interactions with Liao Yongli.
Mo Lan reflects on her connection with Liao Yongli and her professional relationship with him, realizing Du Xiaomei would be furious if she knew.
Mo Lan feels a vague sense of unease, unable to pinpoint what feels wrong.
The next morning, Mo Lan wakes up in what she thought was her room, only to find it was Zhao Yanshu's.
Mo Lan realizes she accidentally locked herself in Zhao Yanshu's room, forcing Zhao Yanshu to share with Jiang Rongxi.
Mo Lan notices a mark on her face, attributing it to her deep sleep.
Dai Rou and Jiang Rongxi appear tired and suggest they haven't slept well.
Zhao Yanshu continues to appear preoccupied and unwell since the previous night's incident.
Mo Lan observes that Jiang Rongxi has developed new pimples, despite her efforts to conceal them.
Mo Lan experiences the unsettling feeling of unease again.
Du Xiaomei is still absent, causing impatience among the departing guests.
The friends head to the dining room, where breakfast of bread and soup is laid out.
Liao Yongli unexpectedly arrives, claiming to have returned early due to successful business.
Dai Rou confronts Liao Yongli, questioning his whereabouts.
Liao Yongli claims to have been with business partners all night.
Mo Lan observes Jiang Rongxi playing with her ring, indicating she is thinking deeply.

concepts.name: Du Xiaomei
concepts.context: The host of the gathering, a wealthy and seemingly cheerful but potentially manipulative woman.

concepts.name: Mo Lan
concepts.context: The protagonist, a thoughtful and observant individual who recalls past events and notices subtle details.

concepts.name: Dai Rou
concepts.context: A friend of Mo Lan and Du Xiaomei, characterized by her directness and a hidden tension.

concepts.name: Jiang Rongxi
concepts.context: A successful and practical friend, known for her financial acumen and cautious nature.
The beautiful but timid friend, who experiences distress and physical discomfort during the gathering.

concepts.name: Eight Delicacies Soup
concepts.context: A dish with a dark history, used as a thematic element and a point of discussion.

concepts.name: Zhang Suping
concepts.context: The subject of the tragic murder case, her story is recounted to add suspense and a darker undertone.

concepts.name: Liao Yongli
concepts.context: Du Xiaomei's husband, introduced at the end, with his arrival adding further questions and suspicion.

concepts.name: Murder case
concepts.context: The central backstory element that casts a shadow over the present gathering.

concepts.name: Invitation
concepts.context: The initial catalyst for the events in the story.

concepts.name: Villa
concepts.context: The setting for the gathering, described as luxurious and remote.

concepts.name: Pregnancy
concepts.context: Du Xiaomei's announcement, which seems to trigger various reactions and plans.

concepts.name: Suspicion
concepts.context: An underlying emotion felt by characters and the reader regarding Du Xiaomei's motives and actions.

concepts.name: Deception
concepts.context: Implied by Du Xiaomei's actions and the overall atmosphere.

concepts.name: Friendship
concepts.context: The relationship between the women, tested by suspicion and past events.

main_topics: Tensions and Revelations at the Gathering
hierarchy.structure: The document follows a chronological structure, interspersed with flashbacks and internal monologues. It begins with the setup of the invitation, delves into a disturbing backstory, details the events of the gathering, and concludes with the morning after and lingering questions.
